description: PowerSHAP is a wrapper feature selection method using Shapley values and statistical tests to determine the significance of features.

related_papers.title: Permutation importance: a corrected feature importance measure
Borutashap : A wrapper feature selection method which combines the boruta feature selection algorithm with shapley values
related_papers.author: E. Keany

implementers.name: Jarne Verhaeghe
